revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=2Wire |model=2700 |revision=HGV |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |cpu1_brand=2Wire |cpu1_model=Ares;3001-000485-003 U;6TVE20100.1 P; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND128W3A2BN6 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL |802dot11_protocols=bg }} *[http://bt2700hgv.tripod.com/ir1002700HGV.htm Unlocking BT 2Wire 2700HGV Business Hub (wireless router)] *[http://bt2700hgv.tripod.com/002.htm#Hardware Version There are multiple hardware revisions of this device.] :BT Dual SSID models broadcast SSIDs of '''BTBusinessHub-XXX''' and '''BT Fusion-XXXX''' (per this site and WiGLE). *[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/29/pcb-photo-of-2wire-2700hg-v/ PCB photo of 2Wire 2700HGV - Hacking the 2Wire] :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=30524&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15 On the DD-WRT forums] [http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/06/eyeballing-the-2wire-2700hgb-bt-businesshub-v2/ Eyeballing the 2Wire 2700HGV (BT BusinessHub t.2/v.2) - Hacking the 2Wire]
[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/12/the-2wire-family-of-tm32-cpus/ The family of TriMedia TM32 CPUs - Hacking the 2Wire] There is a '''STMicroelectronics''' ST20184 ADSL2+ front end on-board.
